Package desktopView

Contains all the code for drawing and representing images for a desktop context.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDesktopCanvas
    The interface for all desktop canvases.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    Stores an animation that updates upon returning a slide.
    ColorImg
    Stores a width x height square with a 32 bit ARGB value.
    DesktopCanvas
    Holds all of the code intended for a desktop view ala Java 1.7.
    DesktopImgUpload
    Loads all image files for a directory.
    EditorCanvas
    Experimental Canvas for future use.
    Sprite
    The basic image.

Package desktopView Description

Contains all the code for drawing and representing images for a desktop context.
Author:
Brian Nakayama
